video.title: Metaru faito Beibureedo
video.synopsis: In this anime adventure series for kids, the forces of good and evil "blade it out," battling each other with enchanted spinning tops.

episodes.synopsis: Newcomer Gingka saves Kenta from the Face Hunters but then is challenged to a 100-to-1 battle.
episodes.title: Pegasus Has Landed

episodes.synopsis: Before Gingka's new friend Madoka can finish fixing his broken bey Pegasus, he uses it to fight Kyoya.
episodes.title: Leone's Roar

episodes.synopsis: Kenta challenges Gingka to a battle. Kyoya is challenged to battle Doji.
episodes.title: The Wolf's Ambition

episodes.synopsis: Doji presents Benkei with the powerful Beyblade Dark Bull so he can defeat Gingka.
episodes.title: Charge! Bull Power!

episodes.synopsis: When a crab-obsessed villain named Tetsuya Watarigani kidnaps Madoka, Gingka must battle him to save her.
episodes.title: Vengeful Gasher

episodes.synopsis: Hikaru Hasama issues a challenge to battle Gingka with Benkei's help, but Kenta poses as Gingka and fights her instead.
episodes.title: Aquario's Challenge

episodes.synopsis: Benkei trains Kenta to face Hikaru again. Madoka gives Kenta a bey part to help him create a new special move, which he uses to defeat Hikaru.
episodes.title: It's Our Special Move! Sagittario

episodes.synopsis: Doji sends Kyoya to Wolf Canyon to prove his worth.
episodes.title: Merci's Dangerous Trap

episodes.synopsis: Kyoya returns from Wolf Canyon and battles Benkei, destroying the warehouse they're in.
episodes.title: Leone's Counterattack

episodes.synopsis: Gingka battles Kyoya, and Kyoya creates a tornado that rips through the city, which inadvertently summons Gingka's friends to cheer him on.
episodes.title: Heated Battle! Gingka vs. Kyoya

episodes.synopsis: Gingka and the gang arrive at the Dark Nebula and are assaulted with a bey storm from above. They must use their special moves to fend it off.
episodes.title: Chase the Wolf!

episodes.synopsis: The gang are met with traps set by Merci on their way to confront Doji. Doji asks Gingka to join forces with him.
episodes.title: Infiltrate the Dark Nebula's Castle!

episodes.synopsis: Gingka battles his long-lost nemesis Ryuga, but his anger gets in the way of winning.
episodes.title: L-Drago Awakens!

episodes.synopsis: In flashbacks, we learn about Gingka's father, Ryo, who originally had the bey Pegasus and was defeated by Ryuga and lightning L-Drago.
episodes.title: Memories of Ryo

episodes.synopsis: The gang sets out to find Gingka in his hometown but are faced with challenges along the way, including a mysterious traveler named Hyoma.
episodes.title: The Mysterious Hyoma

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Gingka's village, the gang is tested by Hyoma, who reveals he is an old friend of Gingka's.
episodes.title: The Magnificent Aries

episodes.synopsis: When the gang arrives in the village, Gingka is not there. Gingka climbs a mountain to obtain a scroll that may hold the key to defeating Ryuga.
episodes.title: The Silver Pegasus

episodes.synopsis: Hyoma and Gingka show the gang their beyblading stadiums of the past. Hyoma challenges Gingka to a battle, the kind they've never done before.
episodes.title: The Green Hades

episodes.synopsis: Benkei and Kenta learn how to change parts on their beys, which makes their beys even stronger, especially for the Aquatic Tag-Team Tournament.
episodes.title: Conquer the Tag-Team Battle

episodes.synopsis: Gingka and his friends go to the remote Beyblade Island to participate in the intense Survival Battle competition.
episodes.title: Begin! The Survival Battle

episodes.synopsis: The Survival Battle continues, and it's down to the wire with eight competitors remaining. Who will win?
episodes.title: Warriors on the Deserted Island

episodes.synopsis: In the jaw-dropping finale of the Survival Battle, the fight takes an unexpected turn and everyone is shocked by the final victor.
episodes.title: The Fearsome Libra

episodes.synopsis: As the winner of the Endurance Battle, Yu is granted his wish: to have a Battle Bladers tournament, the biggest beyblade competition in the world.
episodes.title: The Road to the Battle Bladers

episodes.synopsis: Battles heat up as the bladers earn points for entry into the Battle Bladers competition. Gingka meets a new rival, Tsubasa, who tests his strength.
episodes.title: The Beautiful Eagle, Aguila

episodes.synopsis: Kyoya comes across a calculating opponent named Tobio, aka Captain Capri, whose moves appear erratic but not unstoppable.
episodes.title: The Sniper, Capricorn

episodes.synopsis: Tsubasa proves his worthiness as a blader and joins forces with Doji's Dark Nebula Organization.
episodes.title: Tsubasa Flies into the Dark

episodes.synopsis: The competition to make it into Battle Bladers heats up with Yu battling Hyoma and Tsubasa battling Kenta.
episodes.title: Intruders in the Challenge Match!

episodes.synopsis: As everyone gears up for Battle Bladers, the crab-obsessed Tetsuya is up to his usual tricks defeating everyone -- except Gingka.
episodes.title: Dark Gasher's Big, Crabby-Crabby Operation!

episodes.synopsis: Kenta befriends a new blader, Sora, who has amazing power but no control. Sora copies Gingka's special move but cannot pull it off.
episodes.title: Kenta and Sora

episodes.synopsis: Gingka is pushed to the limits when he enters an important challenge match and faces a self-proclaimed magician named Ryutaro.
episodes.title: The Bewitching Pisces

episodes.synopsis: Four battles go on in four different stadiums as the competition heats up to make it into Battle Bladers.
episodes.title: The Twin Gemios

episodes.synopsis: In an exciting challenge match for Battle Bladers, six bladers are pitted against each other at the same time.
episodes.title: The Stormy Battle Royal

episodes.synopsis: When Phoenix saves Gingka's bey pointer from Tetsuya's claws, Gingka must battle Phoenix and loses all his points.
episodes.title: The Oath of the Phoenix

episodes.synopsis: Gingka has to create a new special move when battling his new opponent, Teru, whose ballet skills make him an incredible blader.
episodes.title: Shine, Virgo!

episodes.synopsis: Tsubasa sneaks into the Dark Nebula but is caught by Doji, who makes him battle many Dark Nebula bladers to earn his freedom.
episodes.title: L-Drago on the Move

episodes.synopsis: Tsubasa is almost defeated by Ryuga in an intense battle, but Phoenix comes to the rescue. Gingka fights Tobio in a stadium of moving walls.
episodes.title: Broken Wings

episodes.synopsis: When a gang led by Busujima takes over their stadium, Kenta and Sora have to battle hard to get it back.
episodes.title: Rock Scorpio's Deadly Poison

episodes.synopsis: Even though Gingka panics about winning back enough points to enter Battle Bladers, he gives up a match to help his friends win against Tsubasa.
episodes.title: Run, Gingka!

episodes.synopsis: Gingka beats Phoenix, leading Phoenix to return his pointer with enough points for Battle Bladers. Tsubasa has been working for the WBBA.
episodes.title: Clash! The Fireblaze vs. the Pegasus

episodes.synopsis: Battle Bladers begins, but it turns out that Doji is in charge. Regardless, Benkei, Kenta and Gingka beat their first opponents.
episodes.title: Go! Battle Bladers

episodes.synopsis: Hyoma must battle an unknown blader, Reiji from the Dark Nebula, who uses a Poison Serpent to take him down.
episodes.title: The Serpent's Terror

episodes.synopsis: The gang nurses Hikaru back to health after her defeat by Ryuga; Yu is forced to battle Reiji to see if he can stay with the Dark Nebula.
episodes.title: The Dragon's Punishment

episodes.synopsis: Benkei battles his idol, Kyoya; Gingka battles Ryutaro, and the winner's celebration is cut short when they are visited by the wounded Yu.
episodes.title: The Deck Is Stacked

episodes.synopsis: Kenta battles Reji for Yu and confuses him.
episodes.title: Entrusted Emotions

episodes.synopsis: After a fierce battle with Ryuga, Tsubasa is eliminated from Battle Bladers; Ryuga issues a challenge to Gingka, who readily accepts.
episodes.title: Eagle Counterattacks

episodes.synopsis: The semifinals pit Gingka against Reiji. Doji takes Yu away, so Hyoma and Kenta go to the Dark Nebula to save him.
episodes.title: Libra Disappears

episodes.synopsis: Gingka manages to defeat Reiji using a mirror to reflect his attacks; Phoenix helps rescue Yu and defeats Doji in battle.
episodes.title: Bonds of Steel

episodes.synopsis: The masked blader Phoenix is revealed to be Gingka's father; Ryuga saps Doji of his energy, making Ryuga more powerful.
episodes.title: The Truth About Light and Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Kyoya and Ryuga meet in an intense semifinal battle. Kyoya is ahead until L-Drago takes over in a final explosion.
episodes.title: Fierce Battle! Lion vs. Dragon

episodes.synopsis: Ryuga builds a special arena for his match with Gingka. Gingka is winning until Ryuga mutates into a monstrous figure.
episodes.title: The Furious Final Battle!

episodes.synopsis: In a spirited finale, Gingka battles with a mutated version of Ryuga. Gingka uses the spirit of all bladers to free Ryuga from the dark bey and win.
episodes.title: Blader's Spirit
